participants.name: Kristel Bowman
participants.title: Talent Acquisition Lead, Technology at Intersys Consulting, Inc.

messages.message:
Exciting Development opps with GM in Chandler, AZ!

Hi Brian, 

My company is currently partnering with General Motors in Chandler, AZ! 

This is a brand new team, and we are looking to hire 30 people in 30 days into GM to build out their next generation end to end ecommerce platform. This is their new "Shop Click Drive" initiative and we are looking for Full Stack Java/JavaScript devs, both mid level and senior, Siebel Devs, QA Testers, and Android/iOS Mobile Devs. This is a career changing opportunity to get involved in something brand new and grow it from the ground up.

If you or someone you know might be interested, please contact me at kbowman@intersysconsulting.com. 

We also offer a $1000 referral bonus if you refer someone who gets hired! 

Thank you and I look forward to sharing more about this exciting opportunity with you!

Kristel Bowman
Talent Acquisition Lead, Technology
Intersys Consulting
(512) 842-5141 
kbowman@intersysconsulting.com
504 Oakland Ave, Austin, TX

Hi Brian,

Great to hear back from you! Do you have some time to chat tomorrow or Thursday to go over the details?

Hi Brian,

I can call you tomorrow evening around 515AZ time, if that works?
Also, what's the best number to reach you?
